text_en: Large fonts make it easier to read.
text_fr: Fonti kubwa hufanya usomaji kuwa rahisi .

text_en: The screen magnifier makes books with small fonts possible to read and understand.
text_fr: Skrini kuzi huvifanya vitabu vyenye fonti ndogo kuwa rahisi kusoma na kuelewa.

text_en: When reading with large fonts people with visual impairment use less time.
A challenge with the screen magnifier is that when many people want to use it, they have to wait for each other to finish.
